message: I'm being generous in the first round.  Let's see if you're willing to work with me.  We can both get a lot more if we cooperate.
I appreciate your generosity, but I think we can both do better. Let's start with a more even split.
Let's get back to a more reasonable split.  This is a good opportunity for both of us.  If we keep rejecting each other, we'll end up with nothing!
